articles.description: It's been a brutal run for PayPal (PYPL) investors. PYPL stock has crashed 70% in less than a year. But, see why I have opened long positions in PYPL stock.
articles.content:
JasonDoiy/iStock Unreleased via Getty Images
It's been a brutal run for PayPal (PYPL) investors. The stock has crashed 70% in less than a year. Yikes.
Let's be honest; the stock was overvalued. It … [+13998 chars]
